name: lootably-postback-hash
description: A library for generating Lootably postback hashes

scripts.publish-patch: npm run build && npm version patch && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.publish-minor: npm run build && npm version minor && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.publish-major: npm run build && npm version major && npm publish && git push --follow-tags

author: Lootably, Inc.
